description: Track changes to the organ record that occur as data is added and changed.  A table for audit trailing the changes.

columns.name: ORG_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the organ record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.  Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TRACK_WHO_ID
columns.description: ID of the user who changed the item.

columns.name: TRACK_ORG_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track changes in organ status.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Inactive


Pre-Procurement


Procured


Transplanted


Failed


In Rejection


Partially Functioning

columns.name: TRACK_RELATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track changes to the donor's relationship to the recipient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Mother - Biological


Father - Biological


Brother - Biological


Sister - Biological


Twin Brother - Biological


Twin Sister - Biological


Half Brother - Biological


Half Sister - Biological


Son - Biological


Daughter - Biological


Related Other - Biological


Domino - Biological


Non-Domino Therapeutic - Biological


Spouse - Non-Biological


Life Partner - Non-Biological


Paired Donation - Non-Biological


Living/Deceased Donation - Non-Biological


Anonymous - Non-Biological


Anonymous Humanitarian - Non-Biological


Anonymous Directed - Non-Biological


Domino - Non-Biological


Non-Domino Therapeutic - Non-Biological


Other - Non-Biological

columns.name: TRACK_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track changes to the organ source.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Living


Donation after Brain Death


Donation after Circulatory Death 


Auto

columns.name: TRACK_HLA_MATCH_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track changes to the human leukocyte antigen (HLA) match type.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Identical


Haplo


Non Match

columns.name: TRACK_DONOR_CRIT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track changes to the donation criteria.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Standard Criteria Donor


Expanded Criteria Donor

columns.name: TRACK_AG_MATCHES
columns.description: Track changes to the antigen matches.

columns.name: TRACK_CDC_YN
columns.description:
Track changes to whether the donor had risk factors for blood-borne disease transmission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TRACK_MATCH_RUN
columns.description: Track changes to match run ID.

columns.name: TRACK_OPO_RISK_YN
columns.description:
Track changes to whether the donor is considered high risk by the organ procurement organization.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TRACK_CDC_YN

columns.name: TRACK_LINK_ORG_ID
columns.description: Track changes to the Organ ID to which the current organ is linked.

columns.name: TRACK_DNR_ID_UNOS
columns.description: Track changes made to the donor ID from the United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS).

columns.name: TRACK_DNR_ABO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Track changes to the donor's blood type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


A+


A-


AB+


AB-


B+


B-


O+


O-


A


B


AB


O


A1


A1B


A2


A2B


A1+


A1-


A2+


A2-


A1B+


A1B-


A2B+
